### Confederation Building PRV and Iso Valve Replacement Tender Announcement

#### Project Details

- **Project ID**: EP788-230631
- **Project Title**: Confederation Building PRV and Iso Valve Replacement
- **Location**: 229 Wellington St, Ottawa, Ontario

#### Project Overview

The proposed contract involves the replacement of existing Pressure Reduction Valves (PRV) and Isolation Valves on the main header in room SB-04 at the Confederation Building. The primary purpose of this project is to ensure the continuous operation of the building until its rehabilitation and minimize downtime.

#### Project Scope

- The project includes the replacement of PRV and Iso Valves on the main header in room SB-04.
- Work is to be completed within 26 weeks after contract award.
- The successful bidder must ensure that all work is carried out in accordance with the terms and conditions of the contract, as well as relevant government regulations and standards.

#### Mandatory Site Visit and Security Clearances

- A mandatory site visit will take place on September 20, 2022, at 10:00am.
- Interested bidders must attend the site visit and sign the attendance sheet to ensure their bid is considered.
- All individuals attending the site visit must have a valid Site Access Clearance.
- The successful bidder must ensure that all personnel with access to secure sites hold a valid Site Access Clearance.

#### Trade Agreement and Tendering Procedure

- This tender is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
- All interested suppliers may submit a bid.
- The contract will be awarded to the bidder offering the lowest price.

#### Contact Information and Documents

- **Contact Name**: Robert Angell
- **Contact Email**: robert.angell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Contact Phone**: (343) 543-8569
- Bid documents are available through the Government Electronic Tendering Service at http://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.
- The deadline for bid submission is October 5, 2022, at 2:00pm.
- Documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada.
